APP_DESCRIPTION.ENGLISH: Memorize is a powerful vocabulary learning assistant designed to enhance your vocabulary retention through scientific learning methods. The application comes with three example vocabulary lists in Chinese, English, and Russian, each containing words with pronunciation, part of speech, and detailed definitions. Whether you're learning a new language or expanding your native vocabulary, Memorize provides the tools you need to succeed.

FEATURES.FEATURE: Custom word lists with detailed definitions, pronunciation, and part of speech
Interactive flashcards for active recall practice
Multiple test modes to assess your progress
Learning statistics to track your improvement
Three example vocabulary lists (Chinese, English, and Russian) included
